name: InterPlanetary Trade Route
description:
This game was made for a game jam in 3 days with the theme "space opera"

Your goal is to buy ships and set trade routes to transport ressources between differents planets

The ressources and requirement of a planet are shown in the tab in the up right corner

You can set route with the up left corner, where you can also find the number of ship you have as well as how many ships you can have

The limits of ships increase after every X planet request completed

A ship will do 4 deliveries before going back to the station
